title: Uchuu Senkan Yamato 2202: Ai no Senshi-tachi
synopsis: Three years since the return of the legendary Space Battleship Yamato, Earth has begun rebuilding itself and has made peace with the Gamilans. However, this recovery comes at the cost of utilizing the forbidden Wave Motion technology.
